name: Ch13BBaseConvo1
_source: speak;Gilliam;General Duessel.|May I have a word before we march?
speak;Duessel;Of course, Sir Gilliam.|What troubles you?
speak;Gilliam;I've heard our next opponent is General Selena of Grado.|You served alongside her, did you not?
speak;Duessel;Yes... Selena the Fluorspar.|One of the Imperial Three, just as I was.
speak;Gilliam;What manner of opponent should we expect?|I prefer to know what we're facing.
speak;Duessel;Selena is...|She's a woman of unwavering loyalty and formidable skill.
speak;Gilliam;You hold her in high regard.
speak;Duessel;Indeed.|She is honorable and just.|I strongly hope we can persuade her to join our cause.
speak;Duessel;Then we face one of Grado's finest.|And a dear friend...
speak;Duessel;Be warned, Sir Gilliam.|She commands powerful ice magic and wields Bolting—a formidable long-range spell.
speak;Gilliam;Bolting?|The thunder magic that strikes from afar?
speak;Duessel;Yes.|Many a soldier has fallen before even glimpsing her on the battlefield.
speak;Gilliam;I appreciate the warning, General.|But my armor has weathered many storms.
speak;Duessel;This is no ordinary storm, Sir Gilliam.|Tread cautiously.|Even your stalwart armor may not withstand her magic.
speak;Gilliam;I will not falter.|If it comes to battle, I shall stand firm against her bolts of lightning.
speak;Duessel;Ha!|You're either remarkably brave or remarkably foolish, Sir Gilliam.
speak;Gilliam;Perhaps both.|But which it is...|You'll have to wait until after the battle to learn.
speak;Duessel;Indeed.|Let us hope we both live to have that conversation.
speak;Gilliam;We shall.|And perhaps with Lady Selena among our ranks.
speak;Duessel;That would be my dearest wish.|Come then, let us march.
